title: Picture
text: First try to draw a triangle given the description and see which sides and angles are given to us.

title: Law of Cosines
text: How could we use the law of cosines to find the length of the third side?

title: Side
text: Which side length are we solving for? What is the formula to find the side length using the law of cosines? (It is a generalized version of the pythagorean theorem)

title: Area
text: How can we find the area after we have found the $$3$$ side lengths? (Use Heron's formula)

title: Final answer
text: After simplifying the equation using the law of cosines what is our area rounded to the nearest tenth?
